name: obsidian-research-attachment-hub
description: A comprehensive research attachment hub for Obsidian with PDF organization, DOI tracking, citation management, and academic paper management

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.build-copy: npm run build && xcopy main.js "F:\obsidian_note\test\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-research-attachment-hub\" /Y && xcopy manifest.json "F:\obsidian_note\test\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-research-attachment-hub\" /Y && xcopy styles.css "F:\obsidian_note\test\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-research-attachment-hub\" /Y

author: Your Name
